text: Nabii Muusa isi marak:Yi-maraw Diggah isin Beqera Yallay taqbudeenih haysitteenimit sinni Nafsi tudlumeenihik sin gine Rabbil gacaay Siinik dambik Barih yan mari umeyna Qiday, tamah Abtaanam khayrih Siinih Aysuk Raqta sin gineh yan Rabbih xaqul, toysa towbat Siinik oggole-le, Diggah Yalli kay Naqoosak dambik kaal gace marak toobat oggolaah keenih Racmata Rabbi kinnik
